thread.title: Woman Posts Dramatic Before-and-After Pics From Her ONE Pound Weight Loss | 22 Words
thread.title_full: Woman Posts Dramatic Before-and-After Pics From Her ONE Pound Weight Loss | 22 Words

title: Woman Posts Dramatic Before-and-After Pics From Her ONE Pound Weight Loss | 22 Words
text:
Over 3 million people just like you 'Like' us » Like it? Share it! 126 Shares 
It's not uncommon to see dramatic weight loss pictures where people have dropped tens of hundreds of pounds. They're very impressive, but as mom and fitness blogger Adrienne Osuna proves, numbers often don't mean a thing. This mother of four struggled with her weight for years before getting serious about her health, adopting a rigorous schedule of power lifting and cardio to gain muscle and a sizable following. A post shared by ↠a d r i e n n e o s u n a↞ (@adrienneosuna) on Feb 15, 2017 at 5:42pm PST 
But one picture in particular that she posted to her blog went viral for pointing out that weight is a misleading goal. It shows her before she started lifting and after — an impressive physical transformation that resulted in a staggering one pound weight loss. A post shared by ↠a d r i e n n e o s u n a↞ (@adrienneosuna) on Feb 17, 2017 at 9:07am PST 
Yes, you’re probably thinking the math is a little fuzzy — two pounds! — but there’s an explanation. Osuna's pic was copied from her blog and blew up all over the Internet — on Facebook, Twitter, Imgur , and more — without giving her credit. A post shared by ↠a d r i e n n e o s u n a↞ (@adrienneosuna) on Feb 20, 2017 at 6:09pm PST 
Looking to reclaim it, she shared it on her own Instagram to help spread her message even further, fixing the numbers to point out an additional pound she had lost in the interim. And it wasn't a vanity thing, but rather that the Internet can stink and her picture was being used in advertisements for weight loss products, which she's never used. A post shared by ↠a d r i e n n e o s u n a↞ (@adrienneosuna) on Feb 13, 2017 at 2:54pm PST 22 Words Rocks ...AND GETS ALL UP IN YOUR FACEBOOK More posts in #Amazing
